title: Art Nouveau similar to Quaint Gothic
content:
New Book cover with an Art Nouveau/Jugendstyl Sans serif.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140701005455im_/http:/typophile.com/files/CountLikeAnEgyptianDetail_5677.jpg)
  
Count Like an Egyptian: A Hands-on Introduction to Ancient Mathematics by David Reimer. Princeton University Press. Publication Date: April 27 2014 ISBN-10: 0691160120 ISBN-13: 978-0691160122  
Any ideas? Thanks.  
Don

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [CountLikeAnEgyptianDetail.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140701005455/http:/typophile.com/files/CountLikeAnEgyptianDetail.jpg) | 73.76 KB |
author: donshottype

comments.content:
Many thanks Bob. That was quick work!  
Don
By the way Don you might check you computer font collection as Kolo was bundled with some Adobe apps like Illustrator at some point and you may have it (or on an install disk).

Thanks Bob. I did find it in my fonts. I must have seen it long ago and forgotten about it. But seeing it on the book cover impressed me as to its suitability as a running text sans with a good combination of legibility, even color and interesting but not overly distracting letterforms. I would probably limit its text use to no more than 50 or so words.  
Don
